title: Research Profile
text:
I am a researcher at Jagiellonian University, specializing in deep learning with a focus on:

Tabular Deep Learning
AI for Metagenomics

I’m doing my PhD at the GMUM lab.

title: Research Profile
text:
Current Grants

Principal Investigator

Pearls of Science Grant
“Sieci prototypowe jako krok do interpretowalnej analizy funkcji białek”
Leading research on prototype networks for interpretable protein function analysis.



Research Team Member

Sonata Bis Grant
“Rozszerzona charakteryzacja mikrobiomu z wykorzystaniem synergii wewnętrznych społeczności mikrobiomowej dla lepszego zrozumienia Ekspozomu”
Contributing to advanced microbiome characterization research.

title: Research Profile
text:
Selected Publications

Recent Work

Machine unlearning for recommendation systems: An insight (2024)
International Conference On Innovative Computing And Communication
Research on machine unlearning techniques in recommendation systems.
Gut microbiome dynamics and predictive value in hospitalized COVID-19 patients (2024)
Frontiers in Microbiology
Analysis of microbiome data using shallow and deep shotgun sequencing.
HyperTab: Hypernetwork Approach for Deep Learning on Small Tabular Datasets (2023) IEEE International Conference on Data Science and Advanced Analytics
Novel approach for handling small tabular datasets using hypernetworks.



Most Used Work

NL-Augmenter: A Framework for Task-Sensitive Natural Language Augmentation (2021)
Northern European Journal of Language Technology
Framework for natural language augmentation
Contention Window Optimization in IEEE 802.11 ax Networks with Deep Reinforcement Learning (2020)
IEEE Wireless Communications and Networking Conference
Application of deep reinforcement learning to wireless networks

title: Research Profile
text:
Research Interests

Deep Learning for Tabular Data
Machine Learning Applications
Wireless Networks Optimization
Natural Language Processing (specifically Information Retrieval)
Bioinformatics and Microbiome Analysis


Collaborations
I actively collaborate with researchers from: * AGH University of Krakow * Jagiellonian University * Małopolska Centre of Biotechnology
